title: Team_MegaPari
author: Team_MegaPari
content: I wanna say hi to all members as im new here I must admit that i find it hard to navigate through posting functions Will anybody tell me the following:-How to put a picture into profile-How to create a clickable banner-How to put a picture to a post so it is shown as a picture and not as a link Thank you in advance!

comments.author: OmegaStarScream
comments.body: Quote from: Team_MegaPari on October 06, 2022, 10:23:47 AMI wanna say hi to all members as im new here I must admit that i find it hard to navigate through posting functions Will anybody tell me the following:-How to put a picture into profile-How to create a clickable banner-How to put a picture to a post so it is shown as a picture and not as a link Thank you in advance! 1. You can't, yet. You have to become a full Member first.2. You can change your signature by going to Profile -> Forum Profile information but you can't make it clickable or use colors because you're a newbie. 3. You need to become at least a junior member.Check this topic[1] to know more about the ranks and the restrictions that come with them[1].If you want to lift some of these restrictions without waiting, you can buy a copper membership[2][1] https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=178608.0[2] https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2385104.msg24371150#msg24371150

comments.author: Rikafip
comments.body: Quote from: Team_MegaPari on October 06, 2022, 10:43:46 AMDo i get it right saying that a copper membership will enable posting pictures but anyway i need to take part in at least 30 posts? To get the points? So my next steps are a membership and a proper engagement into discussions?While copper membership can give you few perks that are not available for newbie rank, there's no real need to buy one as you can engage in discussions and write posts normally with a regular newbie account. For me personally, it only makes sense to get one if you plan to advertise your business here, or if you plan to offer some services.

Yes by having copper membership you can post images instantly as many who wants to promote their services go with this method and there will no restrictions like 30 posts and junior rank so it has its own benefits so you can go through this way also if you want to post instantly.

comments.author: nakamura12
comments.body: Welcome to the Bitcointalk forum. First of all, newbies, jr. members and member ranks can't upload avatar to their profile. You must be a full member rank and above before you can upload any avatat you want. Newbies can't also post images and you must be jr. member rank and above before you can post images using the img code but newbies can now post images in the thread by buying copper membership which remove some restrictions and the signature space is the same as member rank. Hope that helps.
